problem_text_cn: 如图,梯形护坡石坝的斜坡AB的坡度i=1:3,坡高BC为2米,则斜坡AB的长是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the slope of the slope AB of the trapezoidal rock dam is i = N_0:N_1, and the slope height BC is N_2, then the length of the slope AB is ()
raw_answer: 解:因为斜坡AB的坡度i=BC:AC=1:3,BC=2,所以AC=6．∴AB=√{AC²+BC²}=√{2²+6²}=2√{10}(米)．故选:B．
raw_comment: 此题主要考查学生对坡度的理解及勾股定理的运用．
